# TVCaptionButtonViewMotionDirection

**Enumeration**

The directions that the caption button view can tilt in response to user interactions on the remote.

## Declaration

```swift
enum TVCaptionButtonViewMotionDirection
```

## Tilt Directions

- **TVCaptionButtonViewMotionDirection.all**: The caption button view can tilt in all directions.
- **TVCaptionButtonViewMotionDirection.horizontal**: The caption button view can tilt in the horzontal direction.
- **TVCaptionButtonViewMotionDirection.none**: The caption button view can’t tilt.
- **TVCaptionButtonViewMotionDirection.vertical**: The caption button view can tilt in the vertical direction.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Setting the Motion Direction

- **motionDirection**: The direction that the caption button view tilts in response to user interaction on the remote.
